page.title: 13Religion:Lezant Church
page.content: Lezant Parish Church is dedicated to { {St.Briochus}a Celtic saint who founded a religious settlement here having travelled up the River Tamar.The present building is a fine example of{ {Perpendicular}architecture. The present vicar is Fr.Munn,who is also in charge of the parishes of South Petherwin,North Hill and Trewin. Because Fr.Munn cannot lead every service,parishioners assist.There is a choir,and the organist is Mrs.Knight. A recent development is a combined youth group in the parishes,the Jonah Club,which has already performed a musical in each of the churches.
